1.00.name: wordpress/exact
1.00.description: Exact is a free clean WordPress theme with custom header, background, menu and widget features - clean, fast loading and displays a featured image for each post (240px by 240px) to give a simple yet consistent feel to your website. It is very easy to customise and supports widgets, a custom menu, backgrounds and header images - so you can customise your website as much as you need.  More info on the theme can be found in readme.txt
